name: Sunset Citrus Bliss
preparation: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine 2 oz of vodka, 4 oz of orange juice, and 0.5 oz of fresh lemon juice. Shake well until the outside of the shaker feels cold. Strain the mixture into a chilled highball glass filled with ice.
garnish: Orange slice and a twist of lemon peel
backstory: Inspired by a summer sunset, the Sunset Citrus Bliss captures the vibrant colors and the refreshing vibe of the end of a sunny day. The addition of lemon enhances the fruity profile, reminding one of relaxing summer evenings.
